title: The First Templar - Special Edition (GOG) Giveaway
description: Are you ready to uncover the mysteries behind the Templar Order? Download The First Templar - Special Edition for free on GOG! The First Templar - Special Edition is a fast paced third-person RPG with multiple roles and historically accurate locations. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Click the "Go to giveaway" green button and you will be redirected to the GOG home page
2. Scroll down until you find the game banner.
3. Click the "Get it Free" button and login into your GOG account to unlock the game.
